title: Who was the final president of the 19th century? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: William McKinley was US president from March 4, 1897 to September 14, 1901 after being shot on September 5, 1901 by Leon Czolgosz. Since the Twentieth Century began on January 1, 1901, and McKinley was in his second term after being inaugurated on March 4, 1897, McKinley was president in both the 19th and 20th Centuries. He was also the last American Civil War veteran to be president.
